basic-vanilla-cake.notes: Perfect for a quick dessert or a sweet treat.
directions: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
In a large bowl, cream together butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
Beat in eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla.
Combine flour and baking powder, add to the creamed mixture alternately with milk.
Pour batter into a greased 9x5 inch loaf pan.
Bake for 50-60 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.
basic-vanilla-cake.name: Basic Vanilla Cake

directions: Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat.
Add minced garlic and ginger, sauté for 1 minute.
Add chicken breast, cook until browned.
Add broccoli and carrots, stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Pour soy sauce over the mixture, stir to combine, and cook for another 3 minutes.
chicken-veggie-stir-fry.name: Chicken and Veggie Stir-Fry

quinoa-black-bean-salad.notes: Great for meal prep and packed with protein.
directions: Rinse quinoa under cold water.
In a saucepan, combine quinoa and vegetable broth. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to simmer.
Cook until quinoa is fluffy, about 15 minutes.
In a bowl, combine cooked quinoa, black beans, corn, and diced bell pepper.
Drizzle with lime juice and top with avocado before serving.
quinoa-black-bean-salad.name: Quinoa Black Bean Salad

directions: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
Whisk eggs and milk together in a bowl, season with salt and pepper.
Heat olive oil in an oven-safe skillet, add spinach and cook until wilted.
Pour egg mixture over spinach, sprinkle feta on top.
Transfer the skillet to the oven and bake for 10-12 minutes until set.
spinach-feta-frittata.name: Spinach Feta Frittata

classic-chili.notes: A hearty meal perfect for cold nights.
directions: In a large pot, brown the ground beef with onions.
Drain excess fat, then add tomatoes, kidney beans, and beef broth.
Stir in chili powder and cumin.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes.
classic-chili.name: Classic Chili

directions: In serving bowls, layer yogurt, mixed berries, and granola.
Drizzle honey on top.
Serve immediately.
berry-yogurt-parfait.name: Berry Yogurt Parfait

directions: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
Cut potatoes into wedges and place in a bowl.
Toss with olive oil, garlic powder, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Spread out on a baking sheet and bake for 25-30 minutes until crispy.
crispy-baked-potato-wedges.name: Crispy Baked Potato Wedges
